name: Tic Tac Toe World Championship Free!
name_original: Tic Tac Toe World Championship Free!
description:
COMPETE WITH PLAYERS FROM ALL AROUND THE WORLD AND FIGHT FOR THE TITLE! There's only ONE world, so there can only be ONE champion! THE BEST TIC TAC TOE APP FOR iOS IS HERE!

Play turn-based multiplayer matches and work your way up the rankings! The scoring system is simple: the player with the most multiplayer wins is the Tic Tac Toe World Champion!

IF you're good enough to win the title, you better keep winning or someone is going to take your trophy! The title is ALWAYS on the LINE and nobody holds it hostage here!

So you think you're the best Tic Tac Toe player in the world, huh? Well, you better come prove it!!

Application Features:
-World Championship Rankings. The best Tic Tac Toe players from all around the world play here!
-Turn-Based Multiplayer Matches on Game Center!
-Pass & Play Mode! Play with friends in the same room on one device!
-Single Player Mode is fully supported!
-Beautiful, original Tic Tac Toe user-interface. Play on gorgeous wood-grain blocks.

So what are you waiting for? You have nothing to lose! This app is FREE! Start playing for the Tic Tac Toe World Championship now!

There are many Tic Tac Toe apps, but the World Champion ONLY plays here™!
